info.name: Half-Elf Variant
info.description: Variant Half-Elf from the Sword Coast Adventurer’s Guide
info.author: Wizards of the Coast

description.p: Some half-elves in Faerun have a racial trait in place of the Skill Versatility trait. If your DM allows it, your half-elf character can forgo Skill Versatility and instead take the elf trait Keen Senses or a trait based on your elf parentage:

ul.li: A half-elf of wood elf descent can choose the wood elf's Elf Weapon Training, Fleet of Foot, or Mask of the Wild.
A half-elf of moon elf or sun elf descent can choose the high-elf's elf's Elf Weapon Training or Cantrip.
A half-elf of drow descent can choose the drow's Drow Magic.
A half-elf of aquatic heritage can choose swimming speed of 30 feet.

description.p: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

sheet.description: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

description.p: A half-elf of wood elf descent can choose one of the following traits:
You have proficiency with the longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow.

sheet.description: You have proficiency with the longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow.

description.p: Your base walking speed increases to 35 feet.
You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

sheet.description: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured.

description.p: A half-elf of moon elf or sun elf descent can choose one of the following traits:
You know one cantrip of your choice from the wizard spell list. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

sheet.description: You know one cantrip of your choice from the wizard spell list. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

description.p: A half-elf of drow descent gains Drow Magic trait.

You know the dancing lights cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the faerie fire spell once per day. When you reach 5th level, you can also cast the darkness spell once per day. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

sheet.description: 1/day Dancing Lights. Charisma is your spellcasting ability.
1/day Dancing Lights and Faerie Fire. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
1/day Dancing Lights, Faerie Fire, and Darkness. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

description.p: A half-elf of aquatic heritage gains swimming speed of 30 feet.
